::Blazer::

Still holding the sword, one of the droids flies through the air, hitting the 
other, both on them falling. The one on top stands up, spinning around and 
firing at Berserk.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Blazer chuckles, looking at Beserk deal with the droids. "Or maybe I should 
have gotten better ones."
